# GitHub Topics for Better Discovery

Add these topics to your repository on GitHub:

## Primary Topics
- youtube-scraper
- rag
- retrieval-augmented-generation
- gemini-api
- youtube-transcripts
- ai-chatbot
- python
- apify
- youtube-api
- ai-search

## Secondary Topics
- machine-learning
- natural-language-processing
- video-analysis
- content-analysis
- terminal-ui
- markdown
- cli-tool
- video-transcription
- ai-assistant
- youtube-downloader

## How to Add Topics

1. Go to your repository on GitHub
2. Click on the gear icon (⚙️) next to "About"
3. Add topics in the "Topics" field
4. Separate multiple topics with commas

These topics will help users discover your project when searching on GitHub!
